thread.title: 7 Celebrity-Approved Short Hairdos To Try Out This Spring
thread.title_full: 7 Celebrity-Approved Short Hairdos To Try Out This Spring

title: 7 Celebrity-Approved Short Hairdos To Try Out This Spring
text:
Prev Next With a new season, comes the time to try out the various trends that follow it. So, with the onset of spring, there are a lot of fashion, beauty, and hair changes that we are going to see. And some of our favourite celebrities in Bollywood and Hollywood have already made significant hair changes for the upcoming warmer season. And we are dying to give them a try – from Kendall Jenner’s new bob to Parineeti Chopra’s lob. See the seven celebrity-approved short haircuts on our inspo board for this spring. 
While we love Kangana Ranaut’s hair in general, her curly bob right now is giving us life. 
Arya Stark, aka Maisie Williams, shows us how to play around with a super short bob. 
Parineeti Chopra’s textured lob is on point. 
Modern Family’s Ariel Winter is a goddess, with her dark-haired bob. 
Another lob we’re envious of, is Priyanka Chopra’s smooth-as-silk one. 
Kendall Jenner’s new short bob, which she debuted at New York Fashion Week, has a strong hold on our hearts. 
While we’re not used to seeing Sophie Choudry with short hair, she is killing it with her shoulder-length lob. Follow @iDivaOfficial This is dummy error meassage
